availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison, Indiana, resident and soldier (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Son of Thomas R. Enlow and Amanda Givartny Enlow. Married Alice Reynolds Enlow in Louisville, Kentucky on December 6, 1865. Resident in Harrison County, Indiana in 1850. Resident in Harrison, Harrison County, Indiana in 1860. Mustered in as first sergeant in Louisville Provost Guard (U.S.A) on August 30, 1862. Served in Thirty-Fourth Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as corporal and sergeant from September 1862 to May 19, 1865.

ab.bibl:
